resources.string: Enter the URL of the feed
Link to the full article on the Web
Check the connection and try again
Enter the refresh period in minutes
Will the app to check the news AUTOMATIC
Selected unknown news, try to open the news again
Go to the website with the full version of the article
The channel is added, expect to add news
Not added to any channel. Add channel in paragraph "Add Channel"

The app is a news aggregator. Gets the data in RSS format. Once loaded material in Later, you can view without access to the Internet. The program checks the news at specified intervals. The frequency must be set to point \ "Application settings \". Add a new channel by entering a URL link can be in the input field on the channel page additions. Best link copy from the browser to prevent errors. Otherwise, the application will ask for the report link again. However, the link may lead to another (not expected) RSS feeds, which will be loaded. To delete a channel, you must open it and select the menu item \"Delete channel \". The channel will be removed.
language of the application. \nYou need to restart the application to apply the changes.
